languages.text: "О, Ваша Светлость... признаться, мне до сих пор не довелось воспользоваться священным протоколом передачи податей, так как в последний раз корабли Империума появлялись здесь еще при моем предшественнике. Хм, подумать только — ведь это было десятки лет назад... Надеюсь, логистам, виноватым в такой непростительной ошибке, снимут головы!"

"Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I must confess that as yet I have not had the pleasure of filling out a sacred tithe protocol form, as the last Imperial ships to come here did so under my predecessor. Come to think of it, that would have been several decades ago... I do hope the logisticians responsible for such an unforgivable oversight lose their heads over this!"
languages.original_text: "О, Ваша Светлость... признаться, мне до сих пор не довелось воспользоваться священным протоколом передачи податей, так как в последний раз корабли Империума появлялись здесь еще при моем предшественнике. Хм, подумать только — ведь это было десятки лет назад... Надеюсь, логистам, виноватым в такой непростительной ошибке, снимут головы!"

Come to think of it, that would have been several decades ago... I do hope the logisticians responsible for such an unforgivable oversight lose their heads over this!"

"Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I must confess that as yet I have not had the pleasure of filling out a sacred tithe protocol form, as the last Imperial ships to come here did so under my predecessor. Come to think of it, that would have been several decades ago... I do hope the logisticians responsible for such an unforgivable oversight lose their heads over this!"

languages.text: “噢，大人……我必须承认，直到目前为止，我还没有愉悦地填写过神圣的什一税协议表。因为上一次帝国的舰船来到这里，还是在前任管家的任期之中。仔细想想，那应该已经是几十年前的事情了……不知道是哪个疏忽的后勤人员犯下了这种不可饶恕的错误，真希望那个人能掉脑袋！”
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I must confess that as yet I have not had the pleasure of filling out a sacred tithe protocol form, as the last Imperial ships to come here did so under my predecessor. Come to think of it, that would have been several decades ago... I do hope the logisticians responsible for such an unforgivable oversight lose their heads over this!"

traits.locale_text: “噢，大人……我必须承认，直到目前为止，我还没有愉悦地填写过神圣的什一税协议表。因为上一次帝国的舰船来到这里，还是在前任管家的任期之中。仔细想想，那应该已经是几十年前的事情了……不知道是哪个疏忽的后勤人员犯下了这种不可饶恕的错误，真希望那个人能掉脑袋！”

languages.text: «Oh, mi{mf|lord|lady}... Debo confesar que aún no he tenido el placer de cumplimentar el formulario protocolario del sagrado diezmo, ya que las últimas naves imperiales que nos visitaron lo hicieron en tiempos de mi predecesor. Ahora que lo pienso, han pasado ya varias décadas... ¡Espero que los gestores de logística responsables pierdan el puesto por esta falta imperdonable!».
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I must confess that as yet I have not had the pleasure of filling out a sacred tithe protocol form, as the last Imperial ships to come here did so under my predecessor. Come to think of it, that would have been several decades ago... I do hope the logisticians responsible for such an unforgivable oversight lose their heads over this!"

traits.locale_text: «Oh, mi{mf|lord|lady}... Debo confesar que aún no he tenido el placer de cumplimentar el formulario protocolario del sagrado diezmo, ya que las últimas naves imperiales que nos visitaron lo hicieron en tiempos de mi predecesor. Ahora que lo pienso, han pasado ya varias décadas... ¡Espero que los gestores de logística responsables pierdan el puesto por esta falta imperdonable!».

languages.text: 「その、陛下…私はこれまで神聖なる納税手続きの書類を記入する喜びに巡り会えていないのです。前回帝国の船がここに来たのは、私の前任が業務に就いていたころです。考えてみれば、数十年前のことですね…。こちらに来るのを忘れるなんて申し開きのできないそんな過失は、補給担当の責任ですよ！」
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I must confess that as yet I have not had the pleasure of filling out a sacred tithe protocol form, as the last Imperial ships to come here did so under my predecessor. Come to think of it, that would have been several decades ago... I do hope the logisticians responsible for such an unforgivable oversight lose their heads over this!"

traits.locale_text: 「その、陛下…私はこれまで神聖なる納税手続きの書類を記入する喜びに巡り会えていないのです。前回帝国の船がここに来たのは、私の前任が業務に就いていたころです。考えてみれば、数十年前のことですね…。こちらに来るのを忘れるなんて申し開きのできないそんな過失は、補給担当の責任ですよ！」

languages.text: "Oh, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... ich muss gestehen, dass ich noch nicht das Vergnügen hatte, ein heiliges Protokollformular für den Zehnt auszufüllen, da die letzten imperialen Schiffe noch zu Zeiten meines Vorgängers hier waren. Moment mal, dann muss das ja mehrere Jahrzehnte her sein ... Ich kann nur hoffen, dass die Logistiker, die für diese unverzeihliche Schlamperei verantwortlich sind, dafür ihren Kopf verlieren!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I must confess that as yet I have not had the pleasure of filling out a sacred tithe protocol form, as the last Imperial ships to come here did so under my predecessor. Come to think of it, that would have been several decades ago... I do hope the logisticians responsible for such an unforgivable oversight lose their heads over this!"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... ich muss gestehen, dass ich noch nicht das Vergnügen hatte, ein heiliges Protokollformular für den Zehnt auszufüllen, da die letzten imperialen Schiffe noch zu Zeiten meines Vorgängers hier waren. Moment mal, dann muss das ja mehrere Jahrzehnte her sein ... Ich kann nur hoffen, dass die Logistiker, die für diese unverzeihliche Schlamperei verantwortlich sind, dafür ihren Kopf verlieren!"

languages.text: « Oh, Votre Seigneurie... Je dois avouer que je n'ai pas encore eu le plaisir de remplir le formulaire du protocole fiscal sacré, car mon prédécesseur était encore en fonction lorsque les derniers vaisseaux impériaux sont venus ici. Maintenant que j'y pense, cela fait plusieurs dizaines d'années... J'espère que les logisticiens responsables de cette inadmissible omission seront sévèrement punis ! »
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I must confess that as yet I have not had the pleasure of filling out a sacred tithe protocol form, as the last Imperial ships to come here did so under my predecessor. Come to think of it, that would have been several decades ago... I do hope the logisticians responsible for such an unforgivable oversight lose their heads over this!"

traits.locale_text: « Oh, Votre Seigneurie... Je dois avouer que je n'ai pas encore eu le plaisir de remplir le formulaire du protocole fiscal sacré, car mon prédécesseur était encore en fonction lorsque les derniers vaisseaux impériaux sont venus ici. Maintenant que j'y pense, cela fait plusieurs dizaines d'années... J'espère que les logisticiens responsables de cette inadmissible omission seront sévèrement punis ! »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... İtiraf etmeliyim, İmparatorluk gemilerinin buraya son gelişi selefim zamanında olduğundan henüz kutsal aşar formu doldurma şerefine erişemedim. Takribi bir yüz sene kadar olmuştur yani. Böyle affedilmez bir ihmalkârlıktan sorumlu olanlar umarım bedelini canlarıyla öder!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I must confess that as yet I have not had the pleasure of filling out a sacred tithe protocol form, as the last Imperial ships to come here did so under my predecessor. Come to think of it, that would have been several decades ago... I do hope the logisticians responsible for such an unforgivable oversight lose their heads over this!"
